description: Alibaug is a little coastal town in the state of Maharashtra, located below the border of Mumbai. Alibaug is known for it’s beaches. The historical fort ruins and ancient temples can be found around the beautiful beaches. We provide a wide selection of  luxury as well as budgeted villas in Alibaug for rent. Our catalogue includes comfortable and serviced private villas.
name: Alibaug
